author: gbolahan
content:
Hello <@914307919699406908> ,

I am reaching out regarding a project which is being undertaken by an 'independent' team (Mentor: Kev ).  The project's main areas of focus include cryptography, Verkle Trees, and stateless technologies.

I am currently seeking more information about this team; however, due to the team's name being quite common, I am encountering difficulty in locating specific details about them.

If you could kindly provide me with any relevant information or direct me to a reliable source where I can learn more about the Independent Team Project, I would greatly appreciate it.

Thank you for your time and assistance.

author: vdusart
content:
Hey <@794149344763969586>, with <@955481979317518367> we wanted to work on this eth total supply subject üôÇ
And tim is on hollidays for few weeks apparently so he will not answer question until a moment I guess üòÑ

author: mariohavel
content:
All meetings will be recorded! 

Especially if there are people here in time zones which doesn't allow them to participate, please let us know. The recording is a partial solution for now but we can also schedule a separate call with better timing

author: norbertvadas
content: Awesome! Thanks a lot, Mario.

author: mariohavel
content:
Hey <@914072626148810752>, I suppose you were looking into the list of mentors? That's not where proposed ideas are, checkout https://github.com/eth-protocol-fellows/cohort-four/blob/master/projects/project-ideas.md
Kev is an independent contributor, he can help you if you later dive into some of those topics. There are many teams working on these topics. You should learn about the current state of the domain. For some inspiration, checkout similar project from previous cohort, read dev updates by its creator

author: gbolahan
content:
Thank you for replying me <@686695036733227017> 

It was through this I found the Independent team project (9th on the list)
Mentor name: Kev
Team: Independent
Areas of focus: Cryptography, Verkle Trees, Stateless

I can‚Äôt find any other information on this team or their projects

author: mariohavel
content: It's list of mentors, not projects. Kev can help you if your project touches some of those mentioned areas

author: gbolahan
content: Oh, right. Thank You
